query.statement: insert into tlxr_logoutsys ( tenant_id, portal_id, system_id, system_name, logout_url ) values ( :vo.tenantId, :vo.portalId, :vo.systemId, :vo.systemName, :vo.logoutUrl )
update tlxr_logoutsys set logout_url = :vo.logoutUrl where tenant_id = :vo.tenantId and portal_id = :vo.portalId and system_id = :vo.systemId
update tlxr_logoutsys set status = :vo.status where tenant_id = :vo.tenantId and portal_id = :vo.portalId and system_id = :vo.systemId
delete from tlxr_logoutsys where tenant_id = :vo.tenantId and portal_id = :vo.portalId and system_id = :vo.systemId

select a.system_id, a.status, a.logout_url, b.message_name system_name from tlxr_logoutsys a, tlxr_message b where a.tenant_id = b.tenant_id and a.portal_id = b.portal_id and a.tenant_id = :vo.tenantId and a.portal_id = :vo.portalId and a.system_name = b.message_id and b.lang_type = :vo.langType order by b.message_name desc

select a.system_id, a.status, a.logout_url, b.message_name system_name from tlxr_logoutsys a, tlxr_message b where a.tenant_id = b.tenant_id and a.portal_id = b.portal_id and a.tenant_id = :vo.tenantId and a.portal_id = :vo.portalId and a.system_name = b.message_id and b.lang_type = :vo.langType and a.status = 1 order by b.message_name desc

select a.system_id, a.logout_url, a.system_name message_id, b.message_name system_name from tlxr_logoutsys a, tlxr_message b where a.tenant_id = b.tenant_id and a.portal_id = b.portal_id and a.tenant_id = :vo.tenantId and a.portal_id = :vo.portalId and a.system_id = :vo.systemId and a.system_name = b.message_id and b.lang_type = :vo.langType order by b.message_name desc
